reviewText: About 10 years ago my son took a trip with his wife to Hawaii and brought home a video of Seascapes & Sunsets.  It is one of the most relaxing videos I have ever seen.  In fact, my son said he has never been able to get through the whole video without going to sleep.  I use it whenever I am stressed to help me relax.  I have been trying for 2 years to find another one for my brother and his wife with no luck.  Even had another son check for it when he went to Hawaii last year and he couldn't find it.  I found out my brother now has cancer and I tried one more time before going to visit him and went to Amazon and low and behold it popped up.  I was so happy and brought it to my brother and one day he was having a hard time from his chemo treatment, so we popped in the DVD and he went right to sleep.  It last an hour and a half and I wish I could listen to it all night while sleeping.
